name: Time Shift
description:
Time Shift is a Puzzle Platformer in which the player must shift into three different version of themselves. They must use these different versions of themselves to traverse through the level and solve puzzles in each of the levels.

Each one of the different versions has a certain ability that is unique to them. Players will have to utilize each one of those abilities to their advantage and understand how these abilities work with one another.

Time Shift was developed for a global game jam. The game got runner up and crowd favorite at the game jam. Feel free to download and play, also any feedback is welcomed, thank you and enjoy!
